content: Rewrite the message in old english without making it too much longer. This includes not correcting missing commas or punctuation.
hey, want to hop on the game Helldivers 2 later today? i got a new gun.
hail, desirest thou to leap into the game Helldivers 2 this day? I have acquired a fresh firearm.

Hey! I hope your doing well. I wanted to ask if you're free this Saturday? We're planning a get-together at my place around 7pm. It'll be casaul, just some friends hanging out. Let me know if you can make it. Cheers!

Greetings! I hope thy faring well. I wished to inquire if thou art free this Saturday? We're plotting a gathering at mine own abode around 7pm. It'll be casual, merely some friends lingering. Pray, let me know if thou canst make it. Good day!
The Lethal Company is calling our name, we must become very valuable assets to The Company.
Thine Fatal Workplace beckons our presence. We must produce exorbant wealth for our superiors.

Would you rather I try to keep it running here, or would you rather setrun it yourself
If you go to github.com/codespaces you can start it yourself from the github project I think you both have access to

Wouldest thou prefer I endeavour to maintain it operative here, or wouldest thou rather take charge set in motion thyself?
If thou journeyest to github.com/codespaces, thou canst initiate it on thine own from the GitHub project I believe both of thou have permission to access
